membership: Universities UK International is associated to Universities UK, the UK National Rectors' Conference. Universities UK is a member of the European University Association.
legal_status: Part of Universities UK, a registered charity
goals__remit:
Universities UK International (UUKi) is a central observatory, intelligence and delivery unit on HE internationalisation and policy developments for UK higher education institutions.  It is charged with initiating and delivering projects and activities to support and develop the breadth and depth of the UK HE sector’s international activities, and with representing the UK HE sector in European Union policy-making and raising awareness regarding EU funding opportunities. It is the only sector body to represent all UK higher education institutions internationally. 
 
UUKi is funded by the Higher Education Funding Council for England, Higher Education Funding Council for Wales, Scottish Funding Council, Department for Employment and Learning (Northern Ireland), GuildHE, Universities UK, the Higher Education Academy and the Quality Assurance Agency for Higher Education.  
 
Legally, it is part of Universities UK, the UK National Rectors' Conference.
